column1: 52085072$Dystopia the Despondent$$DARK$[Fiend/effect]$$$$$12$5000$5000$$$$Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand or Graveyard) by sending 4 face-up Level 1 monsters you control to the Graveyard
column2: and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Other monsters you control cannot attack. During either player's Battle Step
column3: once per battle involving this card: You can banish 1 Level 1 monster from your Graveyard; until the end of the Damage Step
column4: this card is unaffected by other cards' effects
column5: also it cannot be destroyed by battle.$$$$$

column1: 50185950$Relinkuriboh$$DARK$[Fiend/effect]$$$$$1$300$200$$$$If this card is Tributed: Draw 1 card. If your monster would be destroyed by battle

column1: 66938505$Crystron Rion$$WATER$[Machine/effect]$$$$$3$500$500$$$$During your opponent's Main Phase or Battle Phase: You can target 1 of your banished non-Tuner monsters; Special Summon it
column2: but it has its effects negated (if any)
column5: Synchro Summon 1 Machine-Type Synchro Monster using only that monster and this card (this is a Quick Effect). These Synchro Materials are shuffled into the Deck instead of being sent to the Graveyard. You can only use this effect of "Crystron Rion" once per turn.$$$$$
